thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 7 of 141
thread.title: Abby

author: Abby
title: Abby
text: I bought them to label our child's items for daycare. I am very happy with the product I received. The labels stay on through multiple dish and bottle washes and have held up after 2 months of use. I would highly recommend the product and will use again should the need arise. I was also very pleased with the overall price and the ability to customize the design and color schemes.
